rules_text: Teach target creature you control lifelink. It fights up to one target creature you don't control. [i](To teach lifelink, put a lifelink counter on it. If it already has lifelink, put a +1/+1 counter on it instead.)[/i]
flavor_text: [i]50% of the proceeds go towards helping those affected. Don't ask about the other half.[/i]
